reply.message:
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, Tracy. We appreciate your continued support! Our standard ground shipping rates are based on the weight of the order. The current flat rate for orders up to 4.99 lbs shipped to any physical address within the contiguous 48 states is $9.99; the next tier from 5 lbs to 19.99 lbs is $11.99. 

Some of our customers prefer to place larger orders or order with friends or family members to help get the most out of these flat rate options. We hope this helps to better explain our shipping costs and apologize for any confusion! Warmly ~ Celeste

reply.message: Thank you for your feedback, Elizabeth. We are truly sorry for any confusion or frustration with your recent order. We are able to ship the majority of our products, including the items on your recent order, to Puerto Rico. However, we are not able to ship to PO Box addresses in the Territories. We understand that the address that you intended to use is not a PO Box, but the inclusion of “Box #” in the address triggered our shipping software to restrict you from completing your order. You can avoid this restriction on future orders by substituting the word “box” for “unit” when entering your address. Please feel free to review our Shipping Information page for more details about address and product restrictions here: https://mountainroseherbs.com/ordering/shipping You may also reach out to our friendly Customer Service team Monday through Friday, between the hours of 8 am and 4 pm Pacific Time via live chat, or by phone at 1-800-879-3337 if ever have questions. We are here to help! Warmly ~Celeste

reply.message:
Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Rice. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the number of flowers in your St. John’s Wort. While this lot does contain a good number of buds and flowering heads, they can definitely blend into the chopped leaves, making them hard to differentiate. It is also important to note that while the phenolic compounds are still present in dried St. John’s Wort, they are only photoreactive and turn red when the fresh plant is used in infusions. That said, matters of quality are extremely important to us, and we always want to know if anything is amiss!
 
I am glad to see that you have already been in touch with our Claims & Returns Team. They will reach out to you directly to assist you in getting this matter straightened out.  Warmly ~ Celeste

reply.message:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us! We are sorry to hear that some of the products you are looking for have not been available. Unfortunately, the procurement of natural goods is sometimes unpredictable due to things like weather or crop success, to name a few. When items do arrive at our facility, they are subject to our rigorous quality control process in order to make sure we only provide the best herbal products to our customers. If they do not meet our standards, the product is rejected and we must begin the sourcing process again. For these reasons, a backorder system is not a viable option for us at this time.
 
In regard to our shipping costs, we aim to be as transparent as possible with our customers every step of the way. We understand the appeal of free shipping, but what most do not see is that companies that offer free shipping often have to find ways to recoup those costs and do so by raising product prices. We have chosen to give our customers this information upfront rather than to incorporate it into the cost of our products.
 
We hope this helps to better explain our ordering and shipping processes and greatly appreciate your continued support. Best wishes ~ Erin

reply.message:
Hello, Cardesha. We're sorry to hear that you have been dissatisfied with our customer support timeframe. We did receive your initial review 2 hours ago and sent you a reply within an hour to explain the next steps. Our Claims & Returns Team has been made aware that you have been displeased with one of the items you received and they will be following up with you directly to learn more about the experience you described in your first review. 
 
We also looked to see if you had reached out through email, chat, or phone and we have not been able to find other correspondence that is awaiting reply. If you did reach out, we would love to know more about that so we can look into that further.  
 
We welcome you to email us (support@mountainroseherbs.com), call us (800-879-3337), or utilize the live chat feature on our website if you have any further questions or concerns. Otherwise, our Claims and Returns team will be happy to assist you shortly.  Best ~ Erin

reply.message: Hi there, Jan! Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the Herbal Coffee you ordered. Due to its name, it is not uncommon to think that it only needs a quick brew like most coffee or tea. However, as it is a blend mostly of roots, our Herbal Coffee is best suited for decoction. This method of brewing may help to bring out the body and flavor some more. We are happy to see that you have already spoken with our Claims & Returns Team regarding this issue and they presented some options for resolution. Please feel free to follow up with them directly if you decide to return this item or have any further tips on ways to brew this one or about our return policy. All our best ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for reaching out and sharing your feedback, Tara! It is great to hear that you have been enjoying the quality of our products. We are sorry that the cost of shipping to Hawaii has been higher than you would like. Rates to Hawaii are calculated, in part, based on the weight of the order, but the distance is a factor as well. We utilize FedEx’s live rates for shipping outside of the contiguous 48 states, which we then discount by 30 percent. Because they are live rates, however, they do fluctuate and reflect current transportation costs.
 
Regarding our back-in-stock notifications, we recommend regularly checking junk and spam folders for these types of emails as they are commonly mis-sorted by our customers’ email service providers. Additionally, we recommend signing up for alerts for all size options, as the notifications are dependent on the selection that has been made when entering your email. For example, you have a back-in-stock notification requested for Calendula Flowers. We currently have Calendula Flowers in stock, however, because of limited availability, we only have the 4 oz size available. Your notification was requested for the 1 lb size and since this size has not been available for some time, no notification has been triggered. Entering your email address under both sizes helps to avoid this.
 
We certainly appreciate your continued support and hope that this helps to explain some of the issues you have been experiencing. Wishing you a happy Spring! ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Faith! We do maintain the lowest possible shipping prices for our customers, but there are still costs associated with shipping and handling. We understand that it has become commonplace for online shoppers not to see these charges, as many companies subsidize these costs by raising product prices or charging subscription fees. To stay true to our founding principles, we have opted for a more transparent approach.
 
While we do offer PO Box services, the costs of these services are the live rates from the carrier and so they are subject to fluctuation. Our flat-rate shipping is available for orders shipped to physical addresses in the contiguous 48 states and I do see that you have chosen this option on past orders. The first tier covers orders weighing up to 4.99 lbs, and the next tier covers up to 19.99 lbs. Many of our customers find this information helps them to get the most out of shipping costs. We hope this helps to better explain our approach to shipping and sincerely appreciate your continued support! Warmly ~ Celeste

reply.message:
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us! Your kind words are greatly appreciated. We are sorry to hear that the duties and customs fees for Canadian delivery cost are cost prohibitive. We are always looking for ways to better serve our customers, including lowering our shipping costs whenever possible. When researching the best shipping options for the largest number of our customers, we found that simplifying our shipping services to a single carrier would be best overall. As such, we are now able to offer highly discounted flat-rate shipping charges to the majority of our customers with physical addresses in the lower 48 states. While we understand that, unfortunately, this change does not benefit everyone, that is the reason behind the decision. 

With FedEx as our only carrier, service to Canada includes all clearance entry fees and brokerage; however, the recipient is still required to pay the duties and taxes for the shipment before it can be delivered. Unfortunately, we do not have a way to calculate duty, taxes, or other associated import fees that your government may require. Any Canadian taxes and possible duties are assessed and calculated by your government when your package enters Canadian Customs. You can find additional resources to help understand how the CBSA assesses these costs on our website here: https://mountainroseherbs.com/ordering/shipping. We hope this helps to clarify our shipping processes as they apply to orders going to Canada. We appreciate your continued support. Warmly~Celeste

reply.message: Greetings, and thank you for your feedback! We are glad to hear that ordering from us has been an easy experience. Regarding our processing times, we pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all orders with care. While this attention to detail may add a day or two to fulfillment times, we take pride in the fact that we do business a little differently. We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can make informed decisions. Your most recent order left us in only three days, which was in line with the shortest estimate provided. Additionally, while large corporations often have distribution centers around the country, we are still a relatively small company with all of our operations based in Eugene, Oregon. This means that our customers on the East Coast will see longer transit times, however, we do offer expedited shipping options for qualifying orders. This can be a great choice for those times when you need your order to arrive a little faster. If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment or shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly and we will be happy to help! Warmly, Erin

title: Packaging...My herbs were not sealed at…

reply.message:
Hi there! Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We only recently began heat-sealing our herbal offerings. The reason our bulk herbs have not been heat-sealed all these years is that Mountain Rose Herb is a closed facility and we ship our products directly to our customers using tamperproof tape. However, many of our customers have requested that we offer heat sealed bags, mostly to meet their business needs. As a result, we have started to transition our packing in this way. 

As we complete this changeover, our customers may receive some herbs that have a heat sealed bag and some that do not. Herbs that you may receive during this transition that are not in a heat sealed bag have not been opened or otherwise tampered with. The herb simply has not yet had its packaging updated.
 
As for our shipping timelines, we are sorry to hear that this order took longer to reach you than you were hoping for. I do see that you usually ship your orders to a PO Box. While we are able to deliver to PO Boxes through a relay service called SmartPost, we ship exclusively with FedEx. Unfortunately, the transfer between FedEx and USPS can add extra time to the delivery process when compared with delivery to a physical address and this delivery time may vary. For future orders, you will likely receive your package a bit faster if you are able to ship your order to a physical address.
 
I hope this helps to better explain our packaging and shipping practices. We certainly appreciate you reaching out! All our best ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for your kind words, William! We are happy to hear you have enjoyed the quality of our organic offerings. 
 
As for shipping, we understand that it has become commonplace for online shoppers not to see shipping charges, but the truth is that many companies just include these costs by raising product prices or charging subscription fees. We have opted for a more transparent approach to our pricing structure. 
 
We do offer a discounted flat-rate shipping option for orders shipped to physical addresses in the contiguous 48 states and I do see that you have chosen this option on past orders. The first tier covers orders weighing up to 4.99 lbs., and the next tier covers up to 19.99 lbs. Many of our customers place larger orders less frequently or place group orders with friends and family to get the most out of those shipping costs. We hope this helps to better explain our approach to shipping and sincerely appreciate your continued support! Warmly ~ Celeste

reply.message:
Greetings, and thank you for your feedback, Linda! We are sorry if our shipping times have been a cause for concern. We pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all orders with care. While this attention to detail may add a day or two to fulfillment times, we take pride in the fact that we do business a little differently. 
 
We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can make informed decisions. Your most recent order left us in only three days, which was in line with the shortest estimate provided. Additionally, while large corporations often have distribution centers around the country, we are still a relatively small company with all our operations based in Eugene, Oregon. This means that transit times will vary depending on the delivery area; however, we do offer expedited shipping options for qualifying orders. This can be a great choice for those times when you need your order to arrive a little faster. If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment or shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly, and we will be happy to help! Cheers, ~Celeste

We are sorry to hear that the Wild Lettuce you received did not meet your expectations. We take matters of quality very seriously and would be happy to look into this further for you. reply.message:
Thank you for your review, Jennifer. We are sorry to hear that our shipping time and cost were not what you expected. Here at Mountain Rose Herbs, we do take a little extra time to fill our orders. We pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all orders carefully. While this attention to detail may add a day or two to fulfillment times, we are proud of this personal touch.
 
We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them. I can see that your order left us in 4 days, which was in line with the estimate provided. Your package only spent 3 days in transit, as well, which is even faster than what we are used to seeing for orders that are going to the East Coast. Should you ever need it, we do offer expedited shipping options for qualifying orders. This can be a great choice for those times when you need your order to arrive a little faster.
 
As for the cost of shipping, we have maintained the lowest rates possible while remaining transparent about these costs. Our flat rate tiers, which are available to customers shipping to a physical address within the contiguous 48 states, allow us to offer discounted rates without having to subsidize the cost of shipping with increased product prices. If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment, shipping estimates, or expedited shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly and we will be happy to help! Best, ~ Erin

reply.message:
Hi there, Jeanie! Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear that the listing for our Earl Grey Tea was a cause of confusion. All of our teas will have at least two size options to choose from, either a retail tin or 1 pound bag, and a few of our premium teas also have a retail jar option as the smallest size. 
 
The size selection can be made just below the price where it says “Choose Size"  and the selection currently chosen will be indicated by a darker color. The price will also reflect the size currently chosen.  
 
In addition to the checkout experience, there are some other options for checking the sizes that were selected. The size is listed next to each item in a cart, on the order summary at checkout, and in the order confirmation email. 
 
If in the future you would prefer to place an order on the phone, we would be happy to help with that.  Our Support hours are Monday- Friday from 8:00am to 4:00pm, PST. 
 
We hope that helps offer some helpful information and ways we can better assist you in the future. Best wishes ~ Erin

reply.message:
Hi there, Bobbi! Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We appreciate your kind words and continued support. We are sorry to hear that some of the products you are seeking are out of stock. The procurement of natural products can be somewhat unpredictable depending on a crop’s success. Herbs like Arnica and Self Heal, for example, can be quite challenging to grow; they are often long-term out-of-stock items for us. Our rigorous Quality Control process can also be a factor, as we reject any material that does not meet our standards and must start the procurement process over again. We encourage you to sign up for the in-stock notification email found on the product profile page. You will receive an email as soon as the product you are seeking is available again.

Regarding our fulfillment time, we have made great improvements to our shipping timeframes since your last order in 2023. At that time, we were catching up following the implementation of a new inventory system, and orders were delayed. Now, most orders are leaving us within 2-5 days and we are sure to update the estimated fulfillment time at checkout if this is not the case. We are also offering expedited shipping options for qualifying orders for those times when you need your order a little faster. All our best ~ Erin

Thank you for sharing your feedback, Jenny! We are so glad that you have found the information we provide to be heplful. We are sorry to hear that our fulfillment time has not been as fast as you would like. The bulk of your ordering history with us seems to be from a couple of years ago, and we have worked hard in recent years to improve our fulfillment times, but we may still differ from other companies. Here at Mountain Rose Herbs, we pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all of our orders carefully. While this attention to detail may add a day or two to fulfillment times, we are proud of this personal touch, which also helps us ensure our customers are getting the quality products they have come to know and love.

We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them. I can see that your last order left us in 4 days, which was in line with the estimate provided, and your package was delivered 4 business days later. Should you ever need it, we do offer expedited shipping options for qualifying orders. This can be a great choice for those times when you need your order to arrive a little faster.

If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment, shipping estimates, or expedited shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly, and we will be happy to help! Best, ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! The shipping and handling charge applied to any order is not only for the packaging and shipping materials themselves, but also for the costs associated with transporting packages. Sustainability is extremely important to us, and one way we meet our sustainability goals is by using recycled packaging materials. Our highly trained shipping staff packages all materials in the most efficient way to ensure that your package arrives at your door in pristine condition.

While other companies may offer free shipping, they often recoup these expenses in other ways like increasing product prices, offering products of lesser quality, or requiring subscriptions; here at Mountain Rose Herbs we have chosen to remain transparent about these costs. We hope this helps shed some light on our choices when it comes to shipping and handling. Wishing you well! ~ Erin

reply.message:
Hi there, April! Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. We understand it can be frustrating to be working on an online purchase only to return to it to see the price has changed. We assure you that we only increase the price of our products when it is absolutely necessary.

As a Fair for Life company, focusing on fair wages and equitable treatment of everyone in the chain of production is just as high of a priority for us as the quality of the products we offer. Our pricing reflects this commitment. We are always working to maintain the lowest possible prices for our products without sacrificing on quality or our values.

As far as our sales are concerned, we are sorry you have not had a chance to take advantage of any since you subscribed to our newsletter. It is still the best way to be notified of upcoming promotions. In addition to watching out for promotional codes, we recommend keeping an eye on the sale and clearance pages of our website! We update our specials each month. You can find the current monthly specials here: https://mountainroseherbs.com/catalog/on-sale

Warm wishes! ~ Erin

text:
I’ve been ordering from Mountain Rose for a while now and never had a problem. I got married,bought a house, placed my first order at the new place under a new last name and didn’t receive my order. You could not see a package anywhere in the proof of delivery pic from FedEx. I called Spoke to very nice lady who is going to escalate it To someone higher to get a replacement And my replacement was approved.  I’ve been going back-and-forth with two employees now for weeks. I have confirmed multiple times that They could resend out my package with a signature. Now it has been dead silent from Mountain Rose Herbs And I still have not received a replacement after a month and half of playing phone tag with them. So I don’t know what is going on with their customer service, but is not up to par And after this incident, I probably will not be ordering from here again. 
Update:I have proof of my multiple contact attempts. After this review and 2 more voicemails this morning asking for a refund I was finally sent out a replacement. 
UPDATE: I will never order from this company again customer service is useless and will basically call you a liar. Over the years their customer service has really gone downhill and it’s sad because I used to really love this company.
title: Customer service not up to par

reply.message: Thank you for reaching out with your feedback, Katrina! We are sorry to hear that you did not receive your order. Our Claims & Returns Team was promptly notified of this after you called us. The supervisor of our Claims & Returns Team reached out to you via email on the same day you initially contacted us but does not have any record of receiving correspondence back. They will follow up with you directly with additional information regarding your replacement order. Wishing you all the best! ~ Erin

We offer a return policy with a window of 30 days from the delivery date of your order, which is a standard policy within the herbal industry. Unfortunately, the item you had inquired about returning was delivered 6 months prior to your inquiry, and therefore, outside of our standard return policy. Our Claims & Returns Team was happy to offer an alternative resolution. We are sorry if this resolution was not satisfactory but we look forward to serving you in the future. Wishing you all the best! ~ Erin

title: The fact that you want me to accept…

reply.message:
Thank you for your feedback, Bart. As we explained in our previous communications, cookies are intended to personalize your online experience and add to your convenience when using our website. We have a strict privacy policy that includes our promise never to sell, trade, or export our customers' information to any party beyond our organization. You can view our privacy policy in full here: https://mountainroseherbs.com/policies/privacy-policy/
 
While some may not like the idea of cookies, they are standard for any website you view. The good news is that we also have a helpful team of Customer Service Representatives who are happy to take orders via phone from 8 AM to 4 PM PST, Monday through Friday. This is always an option if you would like to bypass the internet.
 
In our previous communication, we offered to cancel your recent order, issue a full refund, and then delete your account. However, you declined this solution. We encourage our customers to choose options that best suit them and understand that we are not able to accommodate your needs. Nevertheless, we wish you the best in your herbal journey wherever it takes you. Cheers, ~Celeste

title: I didn't receive what was ordered.

reply.message:
Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that the peppermint essential oil you ordered did not meet your expectations. Mountain Rose Herbs’ organic peppermint essential oil is a 100% steam distillation of the Peppermint plant, Mentha piperita. Due to natural variation, botanicals of the same genus and species can differ in the concentration of their constituents, which can cause the same plant to have different aromatic properties. As our Claims & Returns Team explained, the lot you received is sourced from the United States and has a greener and grassier profile than previous lots we have offered from India or Hungary.
 
We want to reassure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected by our Quality Control Team and was indeed found to meet all of our specifications as well as pass identity testing. As one of the first herbal products companies to establish and run a full microbial and analytical lab onsite, we have always been committed to providing high quality botanical products to our customers from a source they can trust.
 
Our Claims & Returns Team was happy to offer multiple options for resolution. We are sorry if this was not satisfactory. Please let us know if you have any additional questions that we may be able to help with or if we can assist you with anything else. Wishing you all the best! ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thanks so much for reaching out and sharing your feedback with us, Cheryl!
 
In reviewing your order history with us, it appears that you most often place orders for the herbal seed packets we carry. In the past, we have exclusively shipped orders with FedEx, and our lowest tier of flat-rate shipping for orders under 5 pounds is $9.99. Recently, we started offering USPS options to our customers with PO Boxes, and I noticed you have used a PO Box address with us in the past. While the flat rates with FedEx are still a great option when placing larger orders, you may be able to ship orders such as these to your PO Box at a more affordable rate. We have also found that our new USPS shipping options allow for faster delivery to PO Boxes than the SmartPost relay service we were utilizing in the past.
 
To compare shipping rates at checkout, you can switch between entering just your physical address and then just your PO Box address, and this will allow you to compare the options available. Please note, however, that there are some items we are not able to ship to PO Boxes. If you have any of these items in your cart at checkout, it will not generate a rate when a PO Box is entered. You can find more information about our updated shipping options, as well as a full list of restricted items here: https://mountainroseherbs.com/ordering/shipping
 
We hope this information is helpful! Please do not hesitate to reach out should any further questions arise. All our best ~ Erin

Cassia Cinnamon, which we also carry, is more commonly used in culinary preparations due to its deep, sweet, and rich flavor. Both of these products are USDA Certified Organic, as are the majority of the herbs and spices we sell. We offer a 30 day return policy so our customers can return items that are not to their tastes. reply.message:
Thank you for sharing your feedback, Agnes! We understand that for many of our customers in Hawaii, the cost of shipping has sometimes been a barrier to placing orders with us. One solution we have recommended was to have orders shipped to friends or family on the mainland and then have them send the order from there. It appears this was the suggestion made by our Customer Service Team the last time you contacted us in November, but you may have already been utilizing this option. We apologize if that did not come across as helpful.
 
That said, we have been working hard behind the scenes to find options that would better suit our customers outside of the contiguous 48 states. We are excited to share that we recently started offering USPS shipping options for orders going to Hawaii, Alaska, and all PO Boxes. We have found that in most cases, these rates are much more affordable than what we were able to offer previously.
 
In reviewing your order history, however, we noticed that you tend to purchase a good deal of extracts, and these would still need to be forwarded to you by a private party. Unfortunately, regardless of the carrier, we are unable to ship certain items to your location due to their classification as flammable materials; this includes all of our extracts. You can find more information about our updated shipping options, as well as a full list of restricted items here: https://mountainroseherbs.com/ordering/shipping
 
We certainly appreciate your continued support and hope this helps to better explain our current shipping options and policies. Warmly, ~ Erin

text: This is my first experience using herbs. I saw your recipe for Qi energy blockage and ordered all the ingredients. I mixed a batch together and made a delicious tea using an empty tea bag. Then I placed the rest in an empty quart mason jar and filled it with boiling hot water, let it cool on the counter and then refrigerated. Now I can pour a Tablespoon or two in my cup, add water and microwave until hot. It’s the perfect way for me to quickly make a cup of tea without having to wait for the ingredients to steep. I love the flavor and enjoy it everyday. Thank you for a lovely positive introduction to herbs and making my own tea. I’m looking forward to more recipes and good ways to use your herbal products. text: I purchased organic dandelion root this past March 2024 and several other herbs.  I had purchased dandelion root in the past from Mountain Rose Herbs and had in the past was very happy with my previous orders. This organic dandelion root powder was nothing like what I had purchased in the past.  After using the organic dandelion root powder for two weeks  realizing that the organic dandelion root powder was doing nothing for me nor were any of the other herb powders that I had purchased in this order.  I looked at the picture of the organic dandelion powder on their website which was a light beige color but what they sent me was a dark roasted color...The organic dandelion that MRH had sent me in the past was a light beige herb powder not dark roasted. When I confronted MRH and told them their was a problem with their herb powders, they responded that they don't always update the picture of the current herb powders on their website and due to the steam pasteurization process that can change the color of the powders. Their poor quality control measures really concerned me. I called two outstanding herb companies and they informed me that they also use the steam pasteurization process on their herbs but this process does not and will not change the color of herbs. MRH gave me permission and sent me a label to return the complete order and they only gave me credit for half my order. I am no longer a MRH customer. MRH is not the company they used to be.   I have purchase organic dandelion root powder from Frontier and have been very happy and satisfied.. You learn the hard way what company has good quality... Who wants to pay for a bad product?
title: Poor Quality

reply.message:
Thank you for reaching out with your feedback, Carole. We are sorry to hear that the color of the herbs you received was a cause for concern. Our Claims & Returns Team was promptly notified of your concerns after you called us, and as they explained, both the treatment of the material after its harvest and the natural variation of the crop itself can influence the appearance of the finished product. In order to ensure a clean final product, some botanicals may be subjected to steam and/or heat treatment prior to being available. This practice is commonplace in the herbal industry. While this type of treatment may not always impact the color of the finished product, it is certainly possible to see this effect.
 
We want to reassure you that all of our products are thoroughly inspected by our Quality Control Team and all the items you received were indeed found to meet all of our specifications. We did email you the Certificates of Analysis for each of your products so you could verify the details and test results of each lot. As one of the first herbal products companies to establish and run a full microbial and analytical lab onsite, we have always been committed to providing high quality botanical products to our customers from a source they can trust.
 
Here at Mountain Rose Herbs, our commitment to the quality and freshness of the products we sell also means that we are frequently receiving new harvests of herbal products, and natural variation may occur. While we do our best to update photos of our products when significant differences in appearance are noted, it is not always feasible for us to update photos for each of the 1,500 products in our inventory every time a new lot is received.
 
In reviewing your correspondence with us, it appears that the Claims & Returns specialist you spoke with was able to extend a courtesy exception to you to simplify the return process. However, not all of the items that were returned to us met the requirements of our return policy, which are necessary to ensure we continue operating under cGMP (Current Good Manufacturing Practice) standards; for this reason, we refunded only the products that we received in their original packaging. We are sorry if the requirements of our return policy were unclear. We reached out to you to explain this further and offer to answer any remaining questions. Despite our best efforts to work together to find a resolution, we were informed that the remaining amount of your order was disputed, and a chargeback was made. Unfortunately, when a chargeback of this nature is requested, we do have to close the account as a result until the matter is resolved.
 
We have appreciated your support over the years, but we also respect everyone's right to choose what is best for their needs, even if that means that they choose another vendor, and it sounds like this is the case in this situation. We wish you the very best in your herbal journey, wherever it takes you. All our best ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for your feedback, Belinda! We certainly appreciate your continued support. The time it takes for an order to reach you on the East Coast can vary based on current fulfillment estimates. We pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all orders with care. While this attention to detail can add a day or two to fulfillment times, we take pride in the fact that we do business a little differently.
 
We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them. That said, transit time for our customers on the East Coast will pretty consistently remain at about 5-7 days with standard shipping. However, we do offer expedited shipping options for qualifying orders. This can be a great choice for those times when you need your order to arrive a little faster. If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment or shipping estimates or expedited shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly and we will be happy to help! Warmly, ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, Mike. We appreciate your continued support! Many of our customers who are local to Eugene prefer to shop at our Mercantile to save on shipping costs. While our Mercantile store does offer many of our products, certain items, including some of the bulk items you prefer, are only available through our online store. 
 
With our flat rate shipping options, the cost of shipping and handling to any physical address within the contiguous 48 states is based on the weight of the order. The current rate for orders up to 4.99 lbs is $9.99; the next tier from 5 lbs to 19.99 lbs is $11.99. Some of our customers prefer to place larger orders, or order with friends or family members, to help get the most out of these flat rate options. We hope this helps to better explain our shipping costs! Wishing you the best ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for your feedback, Daved! While our fulfillment times can vary based on the volume of orders we are working through, transit time from our location in Oregon to our customers on the East Coast is typically at least 5-7 business days. We are pleased to offer expedited shipping options for those times when our customers need their orders a bit faster. However, this is only available for qualifying orders. Unfortunately, this order could not have been expedited due to the flammable nature of the extracts that you purchased, and so it had to travel via ground transportation.
 
If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment or shipping estimates, restricted items, or expedited shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly and we will be happy to help! Warmly, ~ Erin

reply.message: Hi there, Yolanda! Thank you for your feedback. It is true that we are not able to change the items on an order once it has been placed. This is because the payment is finalized at that time. While we are not able to add to orders, we are always happy to assist in canceling the original order so that a new order may be placed with the additional item you would like. Our Customer Service Representative did offer this option in response to your email, however, we did not receive a reply. We are sorry if this was missed! We hope this helps to better explain our policy on adding to orders. Please feel free to reach out if we may be of further assistance. All our best ~ Erin

text:
I've been ordering from Mountain Rose for around 15 years. They have phenomenal customer service,  trustworthy and quality products, fast service and fantastic prices. I drink a lot of tea and am able to target my herbs to my body’s needs, ever-changing as they are. The herbs are great for tincturing, infusing and for tea. I use (regularly) most of their salves too. I get my spices here as well. They are freshly dried, tasty, culinary aides. I wish the Seasons of Discontent still existed, lol. I miss it. I love the Fidnemed for pain control after surgeries (it's a great eveningtea as well); I don't take narcotics. This is a helpful alternative. I can't live without the Moon Ease and Echinacea Elder teas. I use the soap pods for laundry; the clays are fantastic and high quality. 
I could honestly go on and on about how much I adore this company.
title: I absolutely love Mountain Rose Herbs

text: I love Mountain Rose Herbs!  I have tried shopping with other herbal companies, but I find Mountain Rose Herbs to be better in every way.  They are very responsive, kind and knowledgeable in their chat and email.  They have a great selection of high quality organic herbs for good prices and great shipping.  They always package their items very well and secure.  Their herbs come in nice sealed clear plastic pouches which "stand up."  They are also re-sealable.  This is nice because I like to give my bags a wash and dry before use, and they are very nice to store.  Other companies use metallic-like bags which do not stand up and are not re-sealable.  This company really shouts quality at every level, whether that be customer service, pricing or product & packaging quality.  I have switched to them for purchasing all of my herbs, and I purchase ALOT.  I would highly recommend this company.
title: I LOVE Mountain Rose Herbs!

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, Evan! None of the cast-iron teapots currently offered by Mountain Rose Herbs are intended for use directly on a heat source. These artful crafts are intended to serve tea in ceremony or every day enjoyment. We do include this information on the product profile page and are sorry if this was missed!

text: Mountain Rose Herbs has a large selection of organic herbs and curated products. It was awesome to know they have vetted all the products and vendors. It is getting so hard to trust companies with the amount of mis-information and giant corporations buying up most of the smaller brands/comapnies and changing ingredients and or processesing methods. I love that I could buy organic herbs in bulk for a reasonable cost. Everything In my order was packed well & small items like chapstick & rose hip oil individually packed inside the box. I received everything i ordered right on time, it was quick which is necessary living in a state with extreme heat. My beeswax chapstick was NOT melted, the scent is perfect & feels awesome on the lips. The dried herbs are amazing quality and I am enjoying using them and my severe injury feels SO much better!! And healing much quicker too! I won't hesitate to order again. Thank you Mountain Rose Herbs for such amazing products and having great company values and a team that cares and has those same values.

reply.message:
Thank you for your review, DW. Here at Mountain Rose Herbs, we do take a little extra time to fill our orders. We pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all orders carefully. While this attention to detail may add a day or two to fulfillment times, we are proud of this personal touch.
 
We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them. I can see that your last two orders left us in 3 and 6 days respectively, which was in line with the estimates provided. Your most recent order was placed right before the July 4th holiday and had some more herbs to fill than the previous order, so its fulfillment took a bit longer. The order referenced on this review only spent 4 days in transit, as well, which is even faster than what we are used to seeing for orders that are going to the East Coast. Standard transit time from our location to the East Coast is typically 7-10 days.
 
Should you ever need it, we do offer expedited shipping options for qualifying orders. This can be a great choice for those times when you need your order to arrive a little faster. If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment or shipping estimates, or expedited shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly and we will be happy to help! Warmly, ~ Erin

When you are close to being out of stock of something, you say you cannot fill our order because you have to save some for other future orders.  You have a quality product which is why we continue to order from you.  Your customer service is really hard to reach.

reply.message:
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, Lymari! While our fulfillment times do vary based on the volume of orders we are working through at any given time, we are happy to see that your most recent order left us the day after the order was placed and arrived two days later. We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them. Although they are just estimates, I can see that your last 10 orders with us did leave within the timeframe provided, so you can usually count on them being pretty accurate.

It is also worth noting that we pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all of our orders with care. For our customers who primarily place large orders containing a variety of bulk herbs and spices, this may be more apparent. While this attention to detail can sometimes add a day or two to our fulfillment times, we are proud of this personal touch.
 
We were unable to locate any of your recent orders that we could not fill or that required items to be refunded due to inventory. It sounds like you may be referring to the quantity limits that we sometimes impose on products that have low stock or that are generally difficult to procure large amounts of. When an item goes out of stock, we often receive notice from hundreds of customers wanting to be notified of its return. Please understand that quantity limits are only ever imposed in an effort to present a fair opportunity to all of our customers to order the products they want and need; they are never intended to be an impediment or inconvenience.
 
We are sorry to hear that you have had a hard time reaching us! Our Customer Service Team is available by phone at 800-879-3337, Monday through Friday, between the hours of 8 AM and 4 PM Pacific Time. You can also reach us via email or chat during those same hours 7 days a week. Our representatives typically respond to inquiries within 1 business day and we always do our best to let our customers know if this will not be the case. Although there may be times when you need to reach our Wholesale Team directly, our entire Customer Service Team is happy to help if you require more immediate assistance. If you need to place an order, check on its status, ask questions about inventory, or have any other general questions please feel free to reach out.
 
We hope that this helps to explain some of our processes a bit better. We greatly appreciate your continued support and wish you a lovely rest of your Summer season! All our best ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for your feedback, Norvell! We are sorry to hear that your order did not leave our facility as quickly as you would have hoped. As our representative explained in their email to you, we fill many of our products in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all of our orders with care. While this attention to detail can sometimes add a day or two to our fulfillment times, we are proud of this personal touch.
 
It is also worth noting that your order was placed the day after we were closed for a national holiday. This can also extend the fulfillment window for a bit as we catch up. We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them. It looks like the estimate provided for your order was 3-6 days and the package did ship out within that timeframe.
 
We hope this helps explain our fulfillment process a little better. We wish you the very best in your herbal journey, wherever it takes you. All our best ~ Erin

Thank you for your feedback, LA! We are sorry to hear that your order did not leave our facility as quickly as you would have hoped. We fill our products in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all of our orders with care. While this attention to detail can sometimes add a day or two to our fulfillment times, we are proud of this personal touch.
 
We do include our current fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them; these estimates will also reflect pertinent information, such as delays due to closures. 

Your order was placed while we were closed in observance of July 4th; however, it left 2 business days later. As for transit times, we are located in Oregon, and ground shipments to the East Coast can take 5-10 days. 
 
We hope this helps explain our fulfillment process a little better. We wish you the very best in your herbal journey wherever it takes you. All our best ~ Celeste

title: “organic” = “this product may contain lead”

reply.message:
Proposition 65 is a unique California law requiring businesses to include a warning on any products that contain quantifiable amounts of over nine hundred possible chemicals. Due to the unique nature of this state-specific law, which only applies to California, we are obligated to place a Prop 65 warning sticker on all products being shipped to that state. In addition to this, we do share information about this warning in an information box that requires customers to accept before proceeding to check out. We are truly sorry if this information was missed when placing your order. 

We assure you that our products are safe, and we thoroughly test all of them to comply with federal and industry standards for safety. You can find more information about this law on the American Herbal Product's Association website found here: https://www.ahpa.org/content.asp?contentid=165
 
Unfortunately, the most recent emails or chats we could find using the email address associated with your order were from 2022. You can always feel free to contact our Customer Service team via email at support@mountainroseherbs.com or by phone at 1-800-879-3337, Monday -Friday, between the hours of 8 am-4 pm, Pacific Time. We are happy to provide more information about Proposition 65, as well as our testing and Quality Control practices. ~Juniper

reply.message:
Thank you for your feedback, Sarah! We're sorry to hear that you found insects in your bag of organic chickweed. Our Quality Control Team has reviewed the situation and found no other customer concerns with this lot of chickweed, which was purchased over a year ago. We also looked at our retention sample from that lot and found no insect activity.
 
Storage conditions, climate, and other factors are often the issue for at-home insect activity. While it is a rare occurrence, it's important to note that organic botanicals are, in general, more susceptible to insect activity due to the absence of harmful pesticides.

Despite all of that, I do see that our Claims & Returns Team has been in contact with you and see that we have resolved this matter amicably. 

We hope this experience will not deter you from supporting organic agriculture in the future. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns. We are always happy to help you. 

~Juniper

reply.message:
Thank you for your feedback, Mary! We are sorry that the St. John’s Wort Herbal Oil you purchased has not met your expectations. It looks like a member of our Claims & Returns team has been in touch with you about this and has offered to extend our 30-day return policy as a courtesy. You are welcome to return the product to us for a refund if it does not work for your needs.

As my colleague explained, the color of the St. John’s Wort Herbal Oil may vary depending on numerous factors. However, the overall effectiveness of the product is not impacted by the color's vibrancy.

Our herbal oils are hand-crafted in small batches and are made with our organic olive oil, which also may vary in color. A greener olive oil will reduce the red in the final product.

I hope this helps to explain a bit more about our organic St. John's Wort oil and why the color may vary. We wish you the best.
 
~Juniper

reply.message:
Thank you for your review, Leora! Feedback like this is appreciated and is helpful to us in improving the customer experience.

Your current order with us was placed in the evening on the 11th and the estimated timeframe for the order to ship out was 3-8 days. We make this information available during the checkout process to be as transparent as possible about our order fulfillment times and we are sorry if this information was missed. 
Currently, our estimate is a bit longer due to increased order volume from a recent flash sale, however, it looks like your previous order with us shipped out in just 2 days.

We send a confirmation email when your order is submitted and another when your order ships which includes the tracking information. Our Customer Service Team is available via email, live chat, or phone to help with any questions you might have about when you should expect your package to arrive or if you decide to cancel the order before it ships.

We hope this information is helpful and we anticipate your current order will be leaving soon. Please let us know if we can offer any further help and enjoy your day!
~Juniper

reply.message:
Thanks for sharing your feedback, Pamela! We are sorry to hear that you have had trouble finding the products you are looking for. The procurement process is sometimes unpredictable due to weather, crop success, and even international crises. When items do arrive at our facility, they are subject to our rigorous quality control process which helps ensure we only provide the best herbal products to our customers. If a product does not meet our standards, it is rejected, and we must begin the sourcing process again.
 
Without knowing which products you are looking for, it is challenging to speak to the specific reasons they may be out of stock, but as an example, we have seen widespread crop failures of the peppers used for culinary spices like cayenne and paprika in the last couple of years. Issues like this may impact not only our inventory but also the availability of a product across the entire herbal industry.
 
We want to assure you that the availability of certain products is not ever intended to reflect a lack of care for our customers. On the contrary, it is our high quality standards and commitment to sourcing only the highest quality organic herbs and spices that may lead to a product being unavailable for longer than we would like.
 
We hope this helps to better explain our sourcing practices. Please know that we respect everyone's right to choose what is best for their needs, and we wish you the very best in your herbal journey, wherever it takes you. All our best, ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for reaching out with your feedback, TK! We are so glad to hear you are enjoying our products. Here at Mountain Rose Herbs, we pour our herbs in small batches based on our customers’ ordering needs and hand-pack all orders with care. While this attention to detail can sometimes add a day or two to fulfillment times, we are proud of this personal touch.
 
We will always provide a fulfillment estimate prior to checkout so our customers can decide what works best for them. I can see that your most recent order left us in 3 days which was even faster than estimated; the estimate provided at checkout was 5-7 days.  I can see that your package is still on its way. Standard transit time from our location to the East Coast is typically 5-7 business days.
 
Should you ever need it, we do offer expedited shipping options for qualifying orders. This can be a great choice for those times when you need your order to arrive a little faster. If you ever have questions about our current fulfillment or shipping estimates, or expedited shipping options, feel free to reach out to our Customer Service Team directly and we will be happy to help! Warmly, ~ Erin

reply.message:
Thank you for reaching out with your feedback, Peggy! We sincerely apologize that you have had a hard time reaching us. We encountered some technical issues with our phone system over the last couple of days that caused some customers difficulty in hearing the menu options when they called us. This issue has been corrected and we apologize for any inconvenience. Should you ever need to, you are always welcome to email us at support@mountainroseherbs.com or use the live chat feature available on our website.
 
Here at Mountain Rose Herbs, we specialize in organic dried herbs and spices, and can see that you ordered dried Calamus Root from us earlier this month. If you are in need of assistance with this order, please let us know. It sounds like you are in search of a live Calamus plant, however, which we do not offer. In our previous correspondence, you asked for help getting in touch with Customer Support for Strictly Medicinal Seeds as you had purchased Calamus from them. If you need to reach Strictly Medicinal about that order, you may email them directly at ordersupport@strictlymedicinalseeds.com. 
 
We hope this information is helpful and provides some clarification as to why you may have struggled to reach us via phone recently. Please let us know if we may be of further assistance. Wishing you all the best ~ Erin
